formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Texas personal state income tax rate is zero. We compute results using: \( \text{TX State Tax} = \text{Taxable Income} \times 0 \;=\; 0 \) \( \text{After-State-Tax Income} = \text{Gross Income} - \text{TX State Tax} = \text{Gross Income} \) \( \text{Effective State Rate} = \dfrac{\text{TX State Tax}}{\text{Gross Income}} = 0\% \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
